title: Diving Into JumpServer: Attacker’s Gateway to Internal Networks (1/2)
author: Oskar Zeino-Mahmalat
description: Bastion host offers a centralized point of access and control to an internal network, but what happens when this gateway itself is compromised? In this blog series, we will dive into vulnerabilities we found in JumpServer.
cntitle: 深入了解 JumpServer：攻击者进入内部网络的网关 (1/2)
cndescription: 堡垒机提供了一个对内部网络的集中访问和控制点，但是当这个网关本身受到威胁时会发生什么？在本博客系列中，我们将深入研究我们在 JumpServer 中发现的漏洞。
